# Fusaka Devnet-4 Launch

**Friday, Aug 8, 2025 @ 08:00 UTC**

Our largest testnet yet: **1,500 nodes** with **43,520 validators**!
** Total Network: >36M ETH effective balance**

## Configuration
```
Total: 1,500 nodes
├── DigitalOcean: 1,450
└── Hetzner: 50

• 10 Bootnodes
• 100 Supernodes (320 vals @ 1000+ ETH each)
• 1,390 Fullnodes (8 vals each)
```

author: barnabasbusa
content:
To be clear, devnet 4 is the same spec as devnet 3, there are no changes. Thats why we aren't asking new branches from clients. 

We plan to keep devnet 3 around for a while longer, and devnet 4 will live for approx 7d.

author: barnabasbusa
content: Devnet 4 is not really the place to yolo test features, that would still be devnet 3. And again, if you want to use another image than fusaka-devnet-3 please let me know before launch time.
